duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide Direct Therapy for clients in their home or community setting
Supervise RBTs with guidance from a BCBA (for mid-level supervisor role)
Maintain accurate client records and prepare objective session notes
Work directly with clients while taking data simultaneously
Communicate effectively with a diverse group of clients
Implement individualized goals and Behavior Intervention Plan (BIP) with fidelity
Develop individualized treatment goals and treatment plans under BCBA supervision (for mid-level supervisor role)
Observe/run FBA’s and other task list items on the BCBA Task list (for mid-level supervisor role)

education_certification.credential: Active Registered Behavior Technician (RBT) preferred but not required
